roleset.name: collapse inward, violently
roleset.note: IMPLODE-V NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01-3. Framed by Claire. (from implode.01-v)
IMPLOSION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT, implode.01. No VNcls. (from implosion.01-n)

example.name: implode-v: Arg 1 only, as subject
example.text: So he 'll come down to earth a little bit but wo n't totally implode there .

example.name: implode-v: Args 0 & 1
example.text: Wynn also introduced the Strip to the age of implosions when he imploded the old Dunes Hotel and Casino, going on to build the luxurious Bellagio on the site.
example.arg: the old Dunes Hotel and Casino

example.name: implosion-n: arg1
example.text: With the implosion of Cain 's campaign , some big endorsements for Gingrich , and Gingrich 's rapid rise in the polls of GOP voters , InTrade has dutifully given Newtie his turn as the Official Anti-Romney Candidate -- his percentage on InTrade nearly doubled in the last 48 hours , from 16 % to 28 % .
